show.subtitle: Mickey Huff is co-host of the Project Censored Show with former Project Censored director Dr. Peter Phillips. It airs on the progressiveradionetwork.com out of New York City
show.title: Project Censored

title: Corporate Personhood
content:
Join Mickey Huff with special guest co-host Dr. <!--more--> Andy Lee Roth, associate director of Project Censored (Peter Phillips will be back next week).
Today we discuss efforts to challenge corporate personhood and also the increased use of drones, especially in the targeting of civilians.
We kick things off with David Cobb of Move to Amend; at the bottom of the hour we will hear from Steve Zeltzer of Work Week Radio; and we round out todayâ€™s show with activist and author Medea Benjamin discussing her latest book on the use of drones.
